::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus: Let's just say that I've learned to do whatever is needed when you fight with everything on the line.

Rodimus had just finished his line when he was struck by the kick. The talking had distracted him for a brief second. Rodimus sails backwards a bit, spinning, striking the ground face down.

Rodimus gets up and moves in on Cyclonus with his arms out stretched, ready for a grapple. Rodimus attemps to tie it up with Cyclonus with his right hand going for Cyclonus' left arm and his left for Cyclonus' right collar area.

OOC: I hope this makes since. I tend to understand and use wrestling related holds in my hand to hand combat as well as strikes.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus goes sailing over Cyclonus after the 'monkey flip' was
 > executed. Rodimus flips and lands on his back but he quickly rolls to
 > his feet.
 > 
 > Rodimus fires a few of his arm mounted lasers to stir up the sand in
 > front of Cyclonus. Rodimus tries to use this cover as he again leaps
 > at Cyclonus trying to hand out a forearm shot across the jaw.
 
 Cyclonus expected a return attack from Rodimus, but not one from this
 angle. His head is rocked back by the force of Rodimus attack and he
 stumbled back a pace or two. "Hrmph. Rodumus, stooping to underhanded
 means so quickly?" His voice betraying more of a dark humor than
 injured pride.
 
 Cyclonus is obviously a seasoned warrior and he quickly regained his
 proper balance. It is also possible that a few of his backward steps
 were feigned as it left him with ample room for his next atack! With a
 flex of his powerful legs Cyclonus leaped into the air, as he did so he
 spun and at the last moment snapped out a leg, his foot flexed and
 ready, Cyclonus attempted an arial round house kick on Rodimus.
 
 Preston
 (Cyclonus)
